ENDATION 10: Iron and folic acid supplementation
Iron and folic acid supplementation should be provided for at 
least 3 months after delivery.b 
• Review national standards, quality improvement tools, 
and training curricula on postnatal iron and folic acid 
supplementation for postnatal mothers. 
• Strengthen iron and folic acid distribution and 
compliance among postnatal mothers. 
• Review/update national standards to remove vitamin A
